title: Are you last pick? Did you get stuck in a role that you're bad at?
body:
For all you people out there who struggle when you get stuck with top: 

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=mMyFN_1APqw 

Check out last episode too, Last Pick Support Alistar:

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=r7S7Jav_TM8

As always, I'd appreciate if you liked, shared, and subscribed. Is there anyone you would recommend for top or support? What role would you like to see next? Lemme know!
